dict.acceptation: 休息；剩余部分；支持物；宁静，安宁；
使休息；使轻松；使长眠；使依赖；

sent.orig: The patients with REST syndrome had a long course.
This article described REST as an architectural style. In fact, it's architectural style of the Web.
sent.trans: 本文把REST描述为框架样式，事实上，它是一个网络框架样式。

sent.orig: Line slot in arm rest with arm before pushing arm rest all the way in.
sent.trans: 完全固定之前摆正上的开槽方向以放置唱臂。

sent.orig: Continue topping the rest of the chicken and drizzle the rest of the sauce around it.
sent.trans: 之后继续放上剩余的鸡肉条，再淋上些辣椒酱。

sent.orig: A dynamic controller is presented for rest-to-rest flexible spacecraft attitude maneuver with the active vibration suppression.
sent.trans: 针对航天器三轴同时姿态机动时挠性附件的振动抑制问题，提出了基于动态输出反馈控制的主动振动抑制方法。
